<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.incident_resolution_fields" name="Incident Resolution Fields" version="1.0.0" type="feature_set" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true">
<description>Adds Resolved and Resolved by fields to the Incident table, similar to Closed and Closed by, populated with a business rule when an Incident is resolved/closed.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Adds Resolved and Resolved by fields to the Incident table, similar to Closed and Closed by, populated with a business rule when an Incident is resolved/closed.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.incident_resolution_fields</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Incident Resolution Fields</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.incident_resolution_fields/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>m.snc.incident_resolution_fields</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
